name: GKTurnBasedEventHandlerDelegate
desc: The GKTurnBasedEventHandlerDelegate protocol is implemented by an object to receive notifications events for turn-based matches. All methods are called on the main thread.

items.name: func handleInvite(fromGameCenter: [String])
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when the local player receives an invitation to join a new turn-based match.

items.name: func handleTurnEvent(for: GKTurnBasedMatch)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when it is the local player’s turn to act in a turn-based match.

items.name: func handleTurnEvent(for: GKTurnBasedMatch, didBecomeActive: Bool)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when it is the local player’s turn to act in a turn-based match.

items.name: func handleMatchEnded(GKTurnBasedMatch)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when a match the local player is participating in has ended.
